name: March Of Soldiers
description:
March Of Soldiers is a real time strategy single player , multiplayer
It is a military game based on the player's skill and the strength of his financial economy
single player - The story of the game ( Civil War 14 missions, The Invasion 22 missions, The Injustice War 18 missions, The Suppression War 17 missions, The Unjust Victory 22 missions) Total 93 missions

multiplayer - Real Time strategy multiplayer (1v1,2v2,3v3,4v4, FFA) Ranks
